i realize that 99% of people claiming viruses are noobs and are wrong , but this file has a virus in the recycle .exe itself .. it is a zlob trojan and it fkd my computer up bigtime, could not even get it to POST or boot at all. every recycle torrent ive dl'ed is the same way , just rebranded keygens but all have the same zlob trojan in it .
